sense.def:
V električni napravi je
a fuse
žičnata varnostna naprava, ki se stali in prekine električni tok, kadar nastane okvara.

Kadar električna naprava
fuses
, zaradi okvare preneha delovati.

seg.quote: Several of the street lamps had fused.
If the cables had met, they would have fused the lights.

sense.def:
A fuse
je tudi del bombe ali ognjemeta, ki odloži eksplozijo in ljudem omogoči čas, da se umaknejo.

Kadar predmeti
fuse
, se združijo zaradi vročine ali biološkega procesa.

seg.quote: During fertilization the sperm and egg fuse.
Some pieces of gold coin had fused together in the blaze.

sense.def:
To fuse ideas, methods, or systems
pomeni kombinirati zamisli, metode ali sisteme.

seg.quote: ...the attempt to fuse new and old.
His dances are not so much set to music as fused to it.
